## AbstractResponseBuilder.playPlaylist() method

Play a playlist

Note: Only supported by Actions on Google at the moment. If attempting to use this function on Alexa, only the first item in the playlist will be played.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract playPlaylist(playlist: Array<PlayableMedia> | PlayableMedia[]): AbstractResponseBuilder<R>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  playlist | Array&lt;[PlayableMedia](./stentor-models.playablemedia.md)<!-- -->&gt; \| [PlayableMedia](./stentor-models.playablemedia.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The playlist to be played |

[AbstractResponseBuilder](./stentor-models.abstractresponsebuilder.md)<!-- -->&lt;R&gt;

The builder instance
